casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Rocky Kurt WILLIAMSON 66P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 27, 2017 Ms. Ann B. Petersen, Attorney at Law, Chapel Hill, for Rocky Kurt Williamson.

Mr. James R. Glover, Attorney at Law, Chapel Hill.

Ms. Amanda Tomblyn, for Rocky Kurt Williamson. Ms. Kathryn E. Hathcock, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Mr. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th of February 2017 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th of February 2017."
